about_the_game:
K-POP STAR is a provocative and daring visual novel that pulls back the curtain on the high-stakes, glamorous, and often cutthroat world of the Korean pop music industry. It explores the dark underbelly of fame, where success comes at a price, and the boundaries between public image and personal sacrifice blur in the race to stay relevant. The story centers around Ariina Star, a former K-pop sensation whose once-glowing career has begun to fade, forcing her into desperate measures to reclaim the spotlight.

STORY

As Ariina’s popularity plummets and her once-devoted fanbase begins to dwindle, a new hope emerges in the form of an ambitious American businessman who takes over her agency. With the industry’s pressure mounting and few options left, he proposes a scandalous, career-reviving strategy: Ariina will star in an adult-themed streaming show—a shocking and controversial move designed to thrust her back into the limelight.

The show, featuring two homeless American men, sets off an outrageous publicity stunt that ignites public outrage and intrigue. Ariina’s journey to stardom takes a dark and provocative turn as she embraces the controversy, sacrificing her dignity and boundaries in pursuit of the fame she once had.

Along the way, she navigates the treacherous waters of scandal, sensationalism, and moral compromise, delving deeper into a world where image is everything, and the cost of staying relevant could be her own sense of self.

Will Ariina reclaim her fame, or will she be consumed by the very scandal that promises to save her career? The story is an exploration of fame’s fleeting nature, the desperation it can breed, and the personal cost of living in the public eye.

FEATURES

  • Stunning HD Renders: Beautifully detailed artwork brings every moment to life, immersing you in the high-octane world of K-pop.

  • Intriguing and Bold Narrative: Follow a gripping story that exposes the cutthroat dynamics of the entertainment industry, mixed with adult themes of power, desperation, and scandal.

  • Explicit, Mature Content: Uncompromising adult scenes with themes of group sex and fetish play for mature audiences.

  • One-Handed Play Mode: Designed with accessibility in mind, allowing players to enjoy the game comfortably with one hand.

DISCLAIMER

This game is intended for adults only and includes explicit themes such as group sex and fetish play. All characters are over the age of 20, and the game does not condone, promote, or encourage real-world discrimination, offensive behavior, or harmful practices. The game includes scenes of racial roleplay, presented solely as a consensual adult fantasy, without the intent to offend or perpetuate stereotypes. Players are advised to approach the game with an open mind, understanding that its content is purely fictional and created for entertainment purposes only.

Dive into the dark side of the Korean pop industry and experience the dramatic twists and turns in K-POP STAR. Prepare for a journey filled with shocking revelations, sensational moments, and a close look at the sacrifices made in the pursuit of fame.
